description: Seth, 18, and his sister, 6, are orphaned. The girl of his dreams is stolen away. Holding onto faith and his dream, Seth lives frugally and wisely. In the end, he gives the ultimate sacrifice to obtain the prize.

title: A Perfect Chord
description: Cadence has an incredible gift for music, but she also has an extreme fear of the stage that has kept her from performing for anyone but her best friend, Lizzy. Meanwhile, Mika struggles with the weight of expectations that comes from being born into a musical family and wrestles with the style of music her heart yearns to play.

title: Mr. What
description: Mattiesko Wuopio has spent twenty-two years in prison for a crime he did not commit. Now he must re-enter society and face the stigmas of jail time he didn't deserve.

title: My Many Sons
description: Although Don Meyer, men’s basketball coach, claimed the most wins in college basketball until 2011 with a combination of wins in NAIA and NCAA games, he won true success by coaching more than players. He coached lives.

title: Orphaned Courage
description: Elliot Thompson, a headstrong orphan raised by a retired professional MMA fighter, discovers his long-lost brother is not only alive, but known on every street corner as a ruthless gang leader. As the net tightens, Elliot begins to realize that he’s chasing down more than his past—it seems both brothers are on a collision course with who they really are.

title: Closer to God: Jessica's Journey
description: A mother struggles to keep things under control as her daughter  faces terminal cancer. When her estranged father suddenly returns her faith in God is put to the test. Will suffering or faith endure?

title: Trailer Made
description: Daniel and his new-found friend, Asanda, embark on an imaginative journey through different worlds to seek the "ultimate story" to help his father.

title: Swallows and Amazons
description: our children (The Swallows) go on a sailing adventure to an island where they encounter a rival group of kids (The Amazons). Rivalry quickly turns to comradery when pirates threaten all they hold dear.

title: Beau Jest
description: When Sarah Goldman, a lovely young school teacher in Chicago, wants to please her parents, she invents a boyfriend whom she believes will be the man of her mother's dreams. When her parents insist on meeting the man, Sarah hires Bob, an actor, to pretend to be her "beau". The masquerade works flawlessly for a time and brings comic situations, but in the end, their lives are irrevocably changed.

title: Road to the Open
description: Struggling after the loss of his wife, Jerry McDonald is a balding hospital janitor and single father whose only social outlet is tennis with his best friend Mike.  Reluctantly, Jerry agrees to play with Miles in a local tournament that could earn them a match in a prestigious competition. For Jerry, the thought of winning and defeating the long-time club champion Gallant brothers is as unlikely as finding true love again, until a new co-worker enters his life and gives him a renewed hope.

title: Steps of Faith
description: Faith Houston, an accountant, is directed by God to move to a small town to work on a Hippotherapy farm helping children.  Faith decides to follow her heart even though she encounters several challenges. However, she finds herself at the farm in the horse stalls shoveling manure. Faith cracks under pressure and leaves after a child is almost injured, questioning whether she heard God’s voice or not.

title: Sacred Vow
description: Doug and Amber were madly in love and married during their college years. Driven by the “dream” of a prosperous life together – Amber worked two jobs to put Doug through school. Soon after they shared in his business success and celebrated the birth of their precious, beautiful daughter. Fast forward 15 years – Amber has continued to be committed to her husband and their marriage, but Doug has fallen into the traps of an unfaithful spouse, convincing himself that he wants more out of life. In the midst of this turmoil, tragedy strikes, but the series of events that follows just might give this couple a chance to survive and once again regain the love for one another that was pledged in their sacred vows, 15 years earlier.

title: Horse Crazy
description: Three kids who hope to capture their own wild mustang, take on a ring of horse thieves and return a prize stallion to its owner.

title: Message in a Cell Phone
description: Three young boys must crack a voice-mail code and figure out what the message is before they are discovered by desperate men who’ll stop at nothing to destroy the cell phone.

title: Before Your Time
description: A musically enhanced family drama that appeals to all ages. A family dealing with loss and relocation finds healing with the find of an old desiderata list made by their parents in high school. Taking on the challenge they ultimately discover the beauty of always moving forward and of family.

title: Incredible Creatures That Defy Evolution III
description: [NR-Five Dove Seal] Incredible Creatures That Defy Evolution 3 presents powerful evidence that proves that animal designs can only be attributed to a creator. They cannot possibly be explained by evolution. This program will inspire you to look more closely at the world around you.
tmdb_title: Incredible Creatures That Defy Evolution III

title: Brigham City
description: [PG-13 for violence and thematic material] Wes Clayton is the Sheriff and Bishop of a Latter-Day Saint church in a picturesque little burg called Brigham City whose residents are stalked by an unknown serial killer. This mystery will keep you on the edge of your seat until the shocking final twist.

title: Sacred Stone: Temple on the Mississippi
description: In 1846 the last of more than 12,000 Nauvoo, Illinois residents were forcibly driven from their homes to begin their journey west to the Salt Lake Valley, leaving behind the city they had built along with its stately temple. In 1848 the same forces that drove them out also destroyed the temple. More than 150 years later the Nauvoo Temple rises on the very footprint of its original.
tmdb_title: Sacred Stone: Temple on the Mississippi

title: Trail of Hope: The Story of the Mormon Trail
description: The Mormon Trail, a conduit to the West, was used by more than 70,000 emigrants - most of them migrating for religious reasons - on their journey to the Great Basin. The great majority of these pioneers made the trek on foot across windblown plains, sun baked deserts, and frozen mountain valleys, each step a triumph in the face of tragedy, and a testament to unwavering faith.

title: America's Choir: The Story of the Mormon Tabernacle Choir
description: A commemorative portrait of the all-volunteer 360-voice Mormon Tabernacle Choir, celebrating its fascinating history and the remarkable talent behind America's most cherished choral organization. The group, dubbed "America's Choir" by President Ronald Reagan in 1981, imparts a unique musical sound that embodies the American experience. Narrated by Walter Cronkite.
tmdb_title: America's Choir: The Story of the Mormon Tabernacle Choir

title: The Way Home
description: Based on an inspirational true story about how a rural community rallied around a distraught family to search for their missing two-year-old boy and through doing so changed the lives of many of those involved.

title: Treasure State
description: In this family-friendly adventure, two teens must put their rivalry aside and join forces to stop notorious bandits and survive the brutal wilderness known as the Treasure State.

title: Lost Wilderness
description: Four adventurers in search of a family relic find themselves lost in the wilderness and ill equipped to deal with the rugged terrain and each other.

title: JK's House
description: [NR-Dove Approved All Ages] At JK’s House, Dr. Amber Jenkins and JK blends family values and life lessons with music and dance. Special music performance from Cymia Telleria, of Cash Money Records.

title: The Adventures of Chris Fable
description: Chris, a runaway child, lives with a group of misfits in a junkyard, stealing to survive. When a traveling preacher tells him that his father is alive and wants him to come home, Chris must decide whether to stay with his new family of thieves or venture into the wilderness in search of his father and a better life.
tmdb_title: The Wylds: The Adventures of Chris Fable

title: Susie's Hope
description: Based on a true story, Susie’s Hope portrays the inspirational relationship between a pit bull attack survivor (Emmanuelle Vaguer) and an abused pit bull-mix puppy (Susie the dog) as they learn to heal and forgive together.

title: Set Free
description: Danielle Singleton relocates to Pittsburgh after the untimely death of her husband – the love of her life who validated her in spite of the one mistake her preacher father would not forgive. As her son Joshua gets more involved in the youth group at church, Danielle’s heart begins to heal and her faith begins to grow. Then the nineteen year old secret ignites a rippling effect and forces Danielle to realize that truth is the only thing that will set them all free.

title: A Christmas Tree Miracle
description: A father and his dysfunctional family are reminded of the true meaning of Christmas from a local tree farmer as they learn that miracles do come true, if you believe! A warm-hearted holiday tale for the whole family.

title: Once I Was a Beehive
description: After losing her father to cancer, 16-year-old Lane (Paris Warner) reluctantly attends Young Women’s Camp with her new step-cousin and a group of girls who belong to The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints

title: Ladies in Lavender
description: Aging spinster sisters Ursula (Judi Dench) and Janet (Maggie Smith) discover a young man (Daniel Brühl) near death on the beach by their home in a small Cornish fishing village. Taking him in, they discover that he is Andrea, a violinist from Krakow, Poland, who had been swept off an ocean liner on which he was sailing to a fresh start in America.

title: On Wings of Eagles
description: Based on a true Story! 1924 Olympic Gold-medalist Eric Liddell, a Scottish man, felt the call of God to be a missionary and teach in China, but it would not be without cost.

title: Atlas Shrugged Part 1
description: Set in a dystopian United States railroad executive Dagny Taggart and steel mogul Henry Rearden form an alliance to fight the increasingly authoritarian government of the United States.

title: Beauty and the Beast: A Latter-day Tale
description: A young woman agrees to work for a reclusive millionaire to pay off her father's debt. As they spend time together, her kind and caring personality slowly helps him shed his rude exterior.

title: Miles Between Us
description: A father and daughter who have been estranged by divorce for 12 years find themselves on a trip across the country that becomes a journey of pain, hope, healing, and redemption.

title: 16 Stones
description: The exciting journey of faith comes to life in a time fraught with persecution. In 1830s Missouri, James embarks on a quest to find the 16 Jaredite stones, but it is a trail filled with danger and challenges.

title: Hello, I Love You
description: Andy Miller has asked a large number of women he didn't know to marry him. They said no. But Emma, a beautiful veterinary student agrees to go on some dates to see if they'll fall in love. Emma thinks this is all a joke set up by her roommate Mandy, but it's all a reality TV show created by Andy, and Emma's the oblivious star.

title: Day of Defense
description: Could you defend your religion in court? Two Mormon missionaries are arrested and placed on trial for preaching in the small town of Marysville. Attorneys and best friends Thomas Bryant and James Radner stir the town into a frenzy when they must take opposing sides in a court battle over the validity of the missionaries' religion.

title: Rescued
description: Between the so called restrictions of her faith and the so-called freedom of the world, Megan Hughes favors the world. Things change drastically, however, when her plane crashes on a business trip.

title: This Beautiful Fantastic
description: Set against the backdrop of a beautiful London garden, this contemporary fairy tale centers on the unlikely friendship between a reclusive young woman who dreams of writing children's books and a cranky widower.

title: One Man's Treasure
description: A new assignment. A forgotten past. A mystery to solve. A group of missionaries re-open an area and find a journal with a clue that leads them on a treasure hunt.

title: Amazed By You
description: What happens when "City Slicker" Christian Andrews is thrown into a Cowboy World filled with five sisters, two bullies, a whole lot of cattle, one grungy dog and a woman who runs it all, with only his Faith to guide him through it?

title: A Cowgirl's Story
description: Seventeen-year-old Dusty Rhodes goes to live with her grandfather (Pat Boone) because both of her Army parents are fighting in the Afghanistan war.

title: A More Perfect Union
description: In 1787 some of the best minds ever, gathered at Independence Hall in Philadelphia for a Constitutional Convention. This film re-enacts their political battle -- to establish “A More Perfect Union” and change the world!

title: Chasing 3000
description: Two brothers drive across country to see their hero Baseball legend, Roberto Clemente, get his 3000th hit.

title: Chop Kick Panda
description: A fat lazy Panda named Zibo dreams of becoming a master of martial arts, but is stuck as a mere cleaner for a dojo. Little does he know that an evil tiger has plans to take over the kingdom, and he must stop him.

title: Ben Hur
description: When a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.

title: Down By the River
description: A family deals with the disease of sickle cell in their youngest family member. In the midst of this trying time and prosperous time at moments, there are many other obstacles that come into play, that test the very foundation of this family.

title: Bunyan & Babe
description: Twelve-year-old Travis and his little sister Whitney are sent begrudgingly on a summer trip to visit their grandparents' farm in Delbert County. Together they learn firsthand that you don't have to be big to do big things.

title: Esther and the King
description: When a modern-day girl named Amelia faces a big challenge in her life, her mother teaches her about Esther, an orphan raised by a relative named Mordecai. Esther is chosen from all the maidens in the land to become queen, and this was just the beginning of the true story of this courageous woman.

title: David and Goliath
description: Amelia, a shy, modern-day girl has a personal Goliath to face -- a performance in her school's choir concert. To help build Amelia's confidence, her choir teacher tells her the story of David as he takes on the mighty Philistine, Goliath.

title: Daniel and the Lions
description: When his parents go on a trip, 6-year-old Devin is too sad to say his prayers. To help him understand the importance of praying, Devin’s grandpa enlightens him with the story of Daniel and the Lions.

title: Jonah and the Whale
description: God asks Jonah to go and preach to the Assyrians. If Jonah convinces them to renounce their sinful ways, God will forgive them. Jonah, of course, wants them to suffer; he wants them to feel the Lord’s wrath. And so he foolishly tries to run away.
tmdb_title: Rabbit Ears - Jonah and the Whale

title: Joshua and the Battle of Jericho
description: Featuring an introduction by Oscar-winning actor Charlton Heston, this entertaining and educational installment of the animated biblical series vividly recounts the story of Joshua and the Battle of Jericho.
tmdb_title: Joshua and the Battle of Jericho

title: The Story of Moses
description: This entertaining, educational installment of the animated biblical series recounts incredible story of Moses. Hosted by Charlton Heston.
tmdb_title: Greatest Heroes and Legends: The Story of Moses

title: Samson and Delilah
description: Hosted by Charlton Heston, this animated adaptation chronicles the Bible story of Samson and Delilah. Strong Samson is distracted by the beautiful, deceptive Delilah, who learns the secret of his strength is his hair.

title: Joseph and Mary
description: JOSEPH AND MARY is a story of inspiration and hope, of mercy versus revenge, in the years before Jesus became the Man that ultimately changed the course of humanity forever.

title: Hatched
description: Cluck Norris, Chickpea and Tiny SchwarzHENegger are determined to show everyone that chickens really can fly, but when their tiny alien pal, Magic, is in danger, this young feathered trio will save their home and their friend.

title: Left Behind
description: After learning that millions have completely vanished, an airline pilot, his daughter and others work together to unravel the mystery of those left behind in this film based on the hugely popular book series.

title: Left Behind II: Tribulation Force
description: Two weeks after the Rapture, those left behind must band together to form the Tribulation Force, preparing themselves for the worst seven years the planet will ever see in this exciting sequel to Left Behind.

title: End of the Trail
description: Three brothers go to the mountains to release the ashes of their recently deceased father. When they meet someone that they never knew.

title: Fat Chance
description: An overweight dental assistant is challenged to find her self-worth when she falls in love with a young man using her attractive friend's picture on an online dating website.

title: The Identical
description: The story of twin brothers separated at birth in the Great Depression. With different upbringings, one brother becomes a music legend while the other struggles to find a balance between his passion for music and trying to please his father.

title: The Wedding Chapel
description: Uninspired and newly single painter Sarah is down on her luck and wants nothing more than to get away from her problems. When she decides to take a trip to visit her mom, she becomes involved in the efforts to save a local church which is in danger of closing down.

title: The Secrets of the Dead Sea Scrolls
description: Gaining exclusive access to the recent investigation and restoration of the Dead Sea Scrolls, this compelling program reveals the amazing secrets behind these 2000-year-old texts from the Judean desert.
tmdb_title: The Secrets of the Dead Sea Scrolls

title: Miracles of Jesus
description: During His earthly ministry, Jesus Christ performed many miracles that drew people to Him revealed His divine nature and caused many to glorify God.

title: Left Behind: World at War
description: The world falls into chaos as Nicolae Carpathia detonates nuclear devices across the globe and stages multiple devastating attacks against both the Tribulation Force and an international militia, led by U.S. President Gerald Fitzhugh.
tmdb_title: Left Behind III: World at War

title: Healed by Grace 2
description: The cantankerous horse trainer known only as Gauff has a dark past - that includes a messy divorce and hopelessly strained relationship with his adult daughter Brandy, who won't even speak to him. But when Brandy experiences a health scare, Gauff finds himself reluctantly looking after his 14 year old girl granddaughter - whom he was unaware of just days before!
tmdb_title: Healed by Grace 2 : Ten Days of Grace

title: Curly the Littlest Puppy
description: After her father loses his job, Haley is left with their grumpy aunt Judith who is enamored with her pedigree dog. When Judith's dog gives birth to her beautiful babies, mutt puppy Curly finds his way into the unlikely family and enlightens Haley's life.

title: Happy the Littlest Bunny
description: The smallest of three rabbit brothers is always being picked on due to his size. But with the help of his chipmunk friend, he decides to adopt a new personality, which eventually makes him Cornwall County's worst nightmare.

title: The Accidental Missionary
description: When Hollywood "Big Wig" DJ Miller heads out on a luxury vacation, his plans "accidentally" go terribly awry. He ends up on the other end of the earth and out of his element, but he learns that there are no accidents.

title: Zoey to the Max
description: After running away and finally finding her dream forever home, 13 year old foster kid Zoey Manning suddenly finds herself in a fight to protect her new family and their beloved dog Max.

title: My Mother's Future Husband
description: Headley hatches a plan to fix her widowed mom up with a guy (or three) to have some time away from their mother-daughter BFF time.

title: Adventures of the Penguin King
description: Rex, a young King Penguin, has been away from his home for three years, learning to hunt in the deep oceans, but now he's back - in Penguin City. His mission: to find a mate, settle down and raise a chick - to become a true Penguin King

title: Paper Dream
description: A determined woman goes to great lengths to achieve her childhood dream of becoming a mother. When life leaves her out of options, where will she turn?

title: Age of Champions
description: Athletes prepare for the 2009 National Senior Games. Watch the athletes train, talk about why they compete along with family members and friends comments.

title: Grace and Gravity
description: John Palmer comes across a suicidal British atheist who is about to throw himself off a bridge. John's attempts to share his faith are fiercely rejected by Chris. John realizes that it will take more than words to save Chris's life.

title: CS Lewis Through the Shadowlands
description: This movie is about the agonizing spiritual crisis of C. S. Lewis when his wife died from cancer. The love, grief, pain, and sorrow were so shattering to Lewis that his basic Christian beliefs, magnificently communicated in his many books, were now called into serious doubt.

title: The Sign of the Beaver
description: A colonial family seeks a new life in the uncharted Maine wilderness in 1768 and forced to leave their thirteen-year-old son, Matt, alone to protect their claim. He meets a young Penobscot Indian that teaches Matt about survival, trust, understanding, and loyalty.

title: Redemption Ride
description: After testing positive for performance-enhancing drugs, world-class cyclist Colter Reese thought he had ridden his last mile. While trying to hold on to his last remaining treasure, his ill son Jonah, Colter is visited by a mysterious race representative who offers him a chance to ride once more in a unique, long-distance endurance race. Desperate for the prize money that would give Jonah a life-saving operation, Colter sets out on a thousand mile journey that will change everything, starting with himself.

title: The Sparrows Nesting
description: A dejected homemaker starts volunteering at a food bank to cope with her empty nest blues, but a chance meeting with a woman in need sparks a cascade of events that makes her realize maybe her parenting days aren't yet over.

title: Heavens to Betsy
description: Some prayers are best left unanswered. This light-hearted romp will make you laugh and touch your heart as Betsy learns the truth about unanswered prayers and her own perception of God.

title: Bonhoeffer: Agent of Grace
description: This film brings to a wide audience the heroic rebellion of Bonhoeffer, a highly regarded Lutheran minister who could have kept his peace and saved his life on several occasions but instead paid the ultimate price for his beliefs.

title: Uncle Nino
description: Robert Micelli has little time for his wife, son and daughter. This disconnected family is transformed by a visit from his Italian Uncle Nino.

title: Elon Musk: The Real Life Iron Man
description: Discover the meteoric rise of Elon Musk, the man who is transforming the way we think about travel technology through electric cars, the Hyperloop, and revolutionary ideas on how we live through artificial intelligence and colonizing Mars.
tmdb_title: Elon Musk: The Real Life Iron Man

title: Furthest From the Wild
description: Embark on a life-affirming journey through the world of Animal Sanctuaries. Delve into the lives of those who care for beautiful - and at times dangerous - creatures, and take an in-depth look at the struggles and triumphs they face.

title: Finding Happiness
description: While visiting a spiritual community in northern California an investigative journalist with a fair amount of skepticism and a dash of curiosity discovers that the key to finding happiness comes from within and when you change, everything changes.

title: The Current
description: Jake loves living in Chicago but when big city violence hits a little too close to home his parents buy a campground in rural Minnesota and move the family there. Jake hates living at the campground until he meets Peter, the boy across the river. In one of their conversations, Peter shares his Christian faith with Jake.

title: Trust
description: A man's life is turned upside down after a series of unfortunate events that reflect the life of the Biblical character 'Job'.
